About Re-Cycle

Re-Cycle focus on eco-friendly bicycle guiding tours
It was started up in 1995 by Ola Nordman, who had a dream to do something more for our guests.

We will take you on a wonderfull and exciting bicycle tour around our whole town.

You will all get a headset where you can hear our guide talk about the amazing wonderes about this town, and don't worry the headphone will automatically change the language of your choice.

We have 6 different languages that you can choose from: English, Italian, French, Chinese, Portugese and Spanish
